intro: Pasania formosana, commonly known as the Formosan pasania, is a flowering plant native to Taiwan. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes many shrubs and herbs. The plant is characterized by its small, clustered flowers that are typically white or pale pink in color. Its leaves are usually opposite and have a smooth or slightly hairy surface. Pasania formosana is often found in moist, shaded environments such as forests or along stream sides.
